articles.title: Activists in Fisheries Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Activists in Fisheries Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The participants in the meeting of activists in fisheries of the Korean People's Army Sunday laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in the compound of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					 They lined up in front of the statues with deep reverence for the great men of Mt. Paektu before placing the floral basket and bouquets before the statues.
					
					 They made a bow to the statues with great pride of achieving signal successes in carrying out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea by conducting a dynamic fishing drive as intended by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Army Officials Visit Lodgings of Participants in Meeting of Activists in Fisheries
articles.content:
Army Officials Visit Lodgings of Participants in Meeting of Activists in Fisheries
Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, Ri Yong Gil, Jang Jong Nam and officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces Sunday visited lodgings of the participants in the Meeting of Activists in Fisheries of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 They congratulated the participants on working miracles and bringing about innovations in fishing campaign to translate into reality the loving care of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un for soldiers.
					
					 Noting that Kim Jong Un always concerns about the improvement of servicepersons' diet from the viewpoint that the supply service is, as it were, the drive for defending socialism, they referred to the fact that he has sent modern fishing boats to the fisheries field of the KPA to catch more fishes for servicepersons.
					
					 They earnestly called on the participants to always fly big haul flags, true to the intention of Kim Jong Un to provide servicepersons with better living conditions.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected in Wonsan
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Erected in Wonsan
 Wonsan, December 22 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected in Wonsan City, Kangwon Province on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of Kim Jong Il's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statues vividly depict smiling Kim Il Sung with a hand on his waist and smiling Kim Jong Il in simple padded clothes, who wishes the bright future of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 The unveiling ceremony took place on Sunday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Yong Nam, Pak Pong Ju, Jang Jong Nam and other senior officials of the party, state and army, officials concerned, service personnel of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and officials, employees of the units and shock brigade members who contributed to the erection of the statues, and working people and school youth and children in the province.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by leading officials of the party, state and army and senior officials of the province.
					
					 A floral basket sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un was laid before the statues.
					
					 Place before the statues was a floral basket in the joint name of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly and the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 Floral baskets in the name of Kangwon Province, party and power organs, industrial establishments, factories and farms in the province and units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces were also laid before the statues.
					
					 All the participants in the ceremony made a bow to the statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in humble reverence for them who performed immortal exploits on behalf of the country and nation, the times and history by devoting their whole life to accomplishing the cause of Juche, cause of Songun.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, in his address said that the province is closely associated with the great leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The successful building of the statues reflects the intense loyalty and moral obligation of Kim Jong Un and the firm resolution of the people in Kangwon Province who are determined to glorify the revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great men through generations.
					
					 He called upon all the officials and working people to make a dynamic advance towards a final victory in building a thriving socialist nation and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the unfurled flags bearing the beaming images of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, closely rallied around the Central Committee of the WPK headed by Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Production Process of Yarn for Knitwear Completed
articles.content:
Production Process of Yarn for Knitwear Completed
 Hamhung, December 22 (KCNA) -- The production process of yarn for knitwear was completed at the Hamhung Woolen Mill in South Hamgyong Province.
					 Newly-built modern process, another achievement made in carrying out the last instructions of leader Kim Jong Il, makes it possible to increase the knitwear production by fully supplying quality yarn to the knitwear factories.
					
					 Kim Jong Il instructed on December 9, Juche 100 (2011) to build the process at the Hamhung Woolen Mill so as to fully supply quality yarn to the knitwear factories in the areas along the East Sea of Korea.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea set forth the task to build high-speed and high-precision process at the mill true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Il and took measures for the successful completion of the project.
					
					 The workers and officials of the mill completed the project in a matter of more than one year while fulfilling their immediate production plan.
					
					 The organs and enterprises in the province rendered sincere assistance to the construction and thus contributed to completing the project earlier than schedule.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony was held on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, employees of the mill, builders and helpers.
					
					 Conveyed there was a letter of thanks sent by the Central Committee of the WPK to the workers, technicians and officials of the mill who performed labor feats in the building of the process.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Significance of Great Workshop for Officials in Construction Field
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Significance of Great Workshop for Officials in Construction Field
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article says that the recent great workshop for officials in the construction field served as a significant occasion in strikingly demonstrating the idea of the Juche-based architecture of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the validity and vitality of its policy for capital construction, and bringing about a great revolutionary turn in the construction field.
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent a historic letter "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture" to its participants.
					
					 The workshop was a historic grand meeting that powerfully displayed the revolutionary will of the WPK and the Korean people to firmly defend and add luster to the idea of the Juche-based architecture and the leadership exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The idea of the Juche-based architecture and leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il serve as the cornerstone for building a thriving nation and the eternal treasure of the country and nation. They covers the policy of capital construction to be held fast to by the army and people of the DPRK, fundamental principles to be abided by in embodying it, tasks and ways for carrying it out and a wealth of experience and examples.
					
					 The workshop offered an epochal turn in achieving the rapid development of the Juche-based architecture as demanded by the new historical era.
					
					 It is the basic spirit that ran through the whole process of the workshop to bring about a new revolutionary turn in the construction field and put the DPRK's Juche-based architecture on the world level by thoroughly carrying out the tasks set forth in the historic letter sent by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The great workshop also served as a historical landmark in effecting a radical turn in the ideological and moral traits, fighting spirit and the work style of officials and workers in the construction field.
					
					 "Let Us Usher in the Period of Great Prosperity in Construction by Thoroughly Embodying Party's Idea on Juche-based Architecture!"- this is a militant slogan to be held fast to by the officials and workers in the construction field at present, concludes the article.

articles.title: Songun Is Guarantee for Victory of Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Songun Is Guarantee for Victory of Independent Reunification: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The great Songun politics associated with the brilliant wisdom and patriotic will of peerless Songun commander Kim Jong Il is an inspiring banner for paving the road to independent reunification and guaranteeing the security and the eternal prosperity of the nation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Sunday.
					 The politics is a transparent independent politics which laid a foundation for reliably defending the sovereignty of the nation and accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 Thanks to the Songun banner uplifted by the party, the nation's power has grown in every way; the nation's sovereignty has reliably been defended and the cause of national reunification has been successfully carried forward despite the imperialists' intensified moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The Songun politics is the noble patriotic politics which positively encourages the nation to achieve the great national unity and spur the advance in the era of independent reunification.
					
					 Had it not been for the Songun politics, the June 15 joint declaration that ushered in the new era of independent reunification to put an end to the more than half a century-long history of national partition, and the reality in which all the Koreans advanced towards the reunification of the country hand in hand in the idea of "By our nation itself" would have been unthinkable.
					
					 The Songun politics is a strong shield which reliably defends the peace on the Korean Peninsula and the security of the nation.
					
					 History and the reality teach the people the immutable truth that lasting peace can be ensured by the powerful military muscle of the peace-loving forces.
					
					 The powerful arms of Songun of the DPRK which show no mercy to the harassers of peace and war maniacs have frustrated every attempt of the south Korean and foreign war-like forces to unleash another war, reliably ensuring the peace and security of the nation.
					
					 The Songun politics will always serve as a just treasured sword and a strong shield for averting the danger of war and defending the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces US Scheme to Shift Blame for Deteriorating Situation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces US Scheme to Shift Blame for Deteriorating Situation
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Recently a spokesman for the U.S. State Department said that it is vital for the U.S. to maintain the stability on the Korean Peninsula, blustering that the DPRK should refrain from provocative acts unfavorable for the regional stability.
					 Earlier, an assistant secretary of State in a commemorative seminar let loose a spate of rubbish that the nuclear and missile development of the DPRK is the most serious challenge to the U.S. and south Korea.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary says this proves that the U.S. which deteriorated the situation on the Korean Peninsula this year has now become earnest in its moves to escape from the criminal responsibility. The paper goes on:
					
					 No spurious words can hide its sinister intention or its crimes.
					
					 In recent months the U.S. conducted ceaseless joint military exercises and beefed up armed forces on the peninsula and its vicinity.
					
					 From the end of September it staged a combined naval drill against the DPRK in secrecy in the East Sea of Korea. It brought to Pusan Port the nuclear carrier task force of the Navy of its imperialist aggression forces that took part in the drill and held a saber-rattling in the South Sea of Korea. In order to conceal its sinister purpose the U.S. said the drill was for deterring possible "provocation" from the DPRK including nuclear test and missile launch.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, the U.S. made public "tailored deterrence strategy" which envisaged increased threat of a nuclear war against the DPRK and the completion of a plan for a preemptive nuclear strike. From October 25 to the first ten days of November the U.S. waged combined aerial drill Max Thunder together with the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. is now mulling offering 40 F-35s and 14 CH-47Ds to south Korea after setting up the anti-missile functional committee aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The reckless war drills that were staged for less than three months led to a touch-and-go situation on the peninsula where a war may break out any moment.
					
					 However, the U.S. is talking nonsense about the DPRK, while shelving its criminal responsibility for pushing the situation on the peninsula to an uncontrollable phase. This is sophism which can convince no one.
					
					 The U.S. should not try to deceive the international community with a threadbare sleight of hand.
					
					 The U.S. is a chief culprit harassing the peace and stability of the region with ceaseless war maneuvers and arms buildup, concludes the commentary.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Railway Workers
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Railway Workers
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet ruling forces are brutally cracking down on the railway workers in their strike against the privatization of the railway service.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday carries a commentary in this regard.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Shortly ago, the south Korean chief executive at a meeting of senior secretaries called for going ahead with the crackdown upon the strike until its roots are completely removed, terming it an unjustified group action.
					
					 Gentries of the "Saenuri Party" vied with one another, instigating the puppet authorities to strongly cope with the strike.
					
					 Encouraged by it, the fascist maniacs are arresting the core members of the railway trade union, searching their dwelling houses and offices and, at the same time, waging the racket of filing a suit against the participants in the strike and staging the wholesale dismissal of them.
					
					 The fascist violence by the south Korean authorities reminds one of the evil acts of the "yusin" dictator who mercilessly suppressed the workers to prevent them from organizing the union and launching a strike while crying out for "industrialization".
					
					 The strike of the south Korean railway workers is perfectly just as it is aimed at defending their elementary rights to existence and democratic rights.
					
					 But the south Korean authorities branded their struggle as an "illegal strike" at the first consultative meeting for public security after coming to power. They are escalating the crackdown upon the railway workers by mobilizing all the power organs.
					
					 This clearly reveals the despicable nature of the puppet forces as the hateful enemy of the people and heinous group of traitors only keen on the maintenance of "power".
					
					 The puppet ruling forces hell-bent on the unpopular rule and the revival of the "yusin" dictatorship while making a mockery of the people will certainly be made to pay a very high price for their acts of betraying the people.

articles.title: Layoff of Part-time Teachers Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Layoff of Part-time Teachers Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The Korea University branch of the south Korean part-time teachers' union, together with members of civil and social bodies and lawmakers in Kwangju, held a news conference in protest against the wholesale layoff of part-time teachers in the university.
					 The speakers said that the university side is going to fire a large number of part-time teachers under the pretext of the management issue.
					
					 They urged the management side to explain why they must be laid off.
					
					 They noted that the unilateral attitude to lay off those, far from taking good care of them, would come under fire by people.
					
					 The press release read out at the press conference noted that although the part-timers account for half the number of the teachers of the university, they are not allowed to stand on the platform to teach students.
					
					 They urged the management side to stop such a discriminative act.
					
					 It urged the puppet Ministry of Education to grant those part-timers the right as full-time teachers.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Vows to Judge Present "Government"
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Vows to Judge Present "Government"
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea released a statement Thursday on the lapse of one year since the puppet presidential election.
					 The statement denounced the Park Geun Hye "government" for persistently concealing truth behind the fraud-marred election with the government power involved and evading the responsibility for it. It also charged the regime with waging the racket of eliminating the "forces following the north", opening to the public the minutes of the south-north summit talks and attempting to dissolve the opposition party.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 People suffer from serious joblessness and unstable employment and settlement due to the regime's pro-plutocrats policy and its moves of suspending or scrapping all the commitments to bettering the people's living. 
					
					 Soon after seizing power Park persisted in pro-U.S. and pro-Japan diplomacy and the policy of escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen, threatening the peace on this land and worsening the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 No wonder, the people's voices calling the resignation of the present "regime" are growing louder. 
					
					 The statement underscored the need to surely judge the present "regime."

articles.title: Overseas Korean Religionists Demand Park Geun Hye's Resignation
articles.content:
Overseas Korean Religionists Demand Park Geun Hye's Resignation
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Korean religionists in the U.S. and Germany on Dec. 18 made public a joint statement on the situation in demand of the resignation of the chief executive of south Korea. 
					 The statement said that when it was disclosed that power bodies including the Intelligence Service illegally interfered in the "presidential election", south Koreans demanded the punishment of those responsible for it and an apology of Park Geun Hye. However, Park Geun Hye regime covered the truth behind the case and hindered investigation into it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Arrogant and self-righteous practices of rendering ineffective the investigation of the prosecution and disregarding "National Assembly" are rampant under the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					
					 The statement strongly demanded the disbandment of the IS, arrest of Lee Myung Bak who took control of all the power organs at that time and resignation of illegally elected Park Geun Hye.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Dominica
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Published in Dominica
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was published in booklet by a publishing house of Dominica on the occasion of the second anniversary of his demise. 
					 The work, published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995), is a great programme for party building and its activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way for developing the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreign Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered by Foreign Figures
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in DR Congo, Romania, Sweden and Ecuador on December 14 and 16 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Boswa Isekombe Sylvere, general secretary of the Communist Party of the Democratic Congo, at a meeting praised Kim Jong Il for performing immortal exploits on behalf of the Korean revolution and human cause of independence, saying that his exploits will remain forever.
					
					 Constantin Rotaru, chairman of the Romanian Socialist Union, said that the Korean people have achieved great successes in stepping up the economic construction and bolstering up defence capabilities under the wise leadership of supreme leader Kim Jong Un, true to the behest of Kim Jong Il for the past two years after his demise.
					
					 In the next year, too, the Korean people will register only victories in the drive to defend the banner of socialism and reunify the country, rallied close around Kim Jong Un, he stressed.
					
					 Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, said that Kim Jong Il developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and gave lucid solutions to theoretical and practical issues arising in every stage of the socialist construction, thus illuminating the way for the efforts of progressive mankind to achieve independence.
					
					 Julio Ballesteros Espin, chairman of the Ecuador-Guaranda Institute for Friendship and Cultural Solidarity with the Korean People, praised Kim Jong Il as the eternal leader of mankind and brilliant Songun commander.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Remembered in India
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Remembered in India
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place in India from Dec. 7 to 14 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il. They included a remembrance meeting, seminar on his exploits, lecture, book and photo exhibition and film show by the Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung, the Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, the Juche Philosophy Study Committee, national information technology institute and Juche idea study societies in 28 local cities of India.
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos documenting the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also displayed there were books and photos introducing the DPRK.
					
					 Films shown included Korean film "Arms of Korea."
					
					 The chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung said that Kim Jong Il led the Workers' Party of Korea for decades, performing distinguished feats for the development of the party.
					
					 The chairman of the Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il noted that Kim Jong Il was the great master of leadership. He aroused the army and people of the DPRK to defending socialism under the uplifted banner of Songun, opening a turning phase for the building of a thriving nation, the chairman said, adding:
					
					 He ushered in the grand June 15 era of reunification based on the idea of "By the Korean nation itself" and conducted energetic external activities, making great contributions to accomplishing the human cause of independence and defending global peace and security.
					
					 The chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee said that the history does not know such a great man as Kim Jong Il who dedicated his whole life to the people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries from Dec. 12 to 15 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They included a seminar in Bangladesh, a seminar, film show and lecture in Romania and film shows in Nigeria.
					
					 Participants in film shows watched Korean films "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Pyongyang Today", etc.
					
					 The secretary general of the Bangladeshi Institute of the Juche Idea and other speakers highly praised Kim Jong Il for wisely leading the Korean people in their efforts for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification and thus performing great exploits on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 The chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania said it is a precious fruition of the outstanding and experienced leadership of Kim Jong Il that the Korean people have vigorously advanced the cause of socialism despite the desperate offensives of the imperialists against it.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association praised Kim Jong Il as a great thinker and theoretician and ever-victorious strategist who developed the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 The managing director of a company in Lagos, Nigeria praised Kim Jong Il as a prominent leader recognized by the world, saying his exploits for the Korean people and progressive humanity will last forever.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at a seminar held by the Socialist Party of Romania.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Russian, Indian Papers
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Observed by Russian, Indian Papers
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Papers of Russia and India carried special write-ups on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Russian paper Priamurskiye Vedomostsi on Dec. 16 carried an article titled "Snow and Kim Jong Il" illustrated with a portrait of smiling Kim Jong Il. It said:
					
					 Snow is what comes across people's minds first when looking back upon the life of Chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in snowy Mt. Paektu and was bidden last farewell by people in snowy December. Snow gives refreshing feelings to the people and provides life-giving water to earth.
					
					 His life was as pure as snow.
					
					 His noble life will always be remembered in the hearts of the Koreans and all other people in the world.
					
					 New Delhi Times on December 12 devoted one whole page to a special write-up illustrated with a photo documenting his undying exploits.
					
					 The Indian And World Event on Dec. 14 also devoted one whole page to articles praising the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il illustrated with a photo showing his revolutionary activities.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Political Parties, organizations of various countries posted special write-ups on their websites in the period between Dec. 6 and 17 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Socialist Party of Romania posted an article titled "Great leader Kim Jong Il" on its website "Juche Idea".
					
					 The article noted that Kim Jong Il firmly protected the dignity and sovereignty of the country and opened up a bright prospect of building a thriving nation and realizing the country's reunification, holding high the banner of Songun.
					
					 The Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association posted on its website an article titled "Comrade Kim Jong Il will always live as the sun" with his photos.
					
					 The Society for the Promotion of the Relations between Austria and DPRK posted various articles on its website.
					
					 Noting one of the exploits Chairman of the National Defence Commission Kim Jong Il performed for the cause of socialism was that he protected socialism, an article titled "Exploits for cause of socialism" said:
					
					 At the end of the 20th century he dealt a resolute counter-strike at the moves of the imperialists and anti-socialist elements by proving the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism and inevitability of its victory through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 He also protected the DPRK and ushered in a new era of surge for the cause of socialism by pursuing the original Songun politics.
					
					 The undying exploits he performed for the cause of socialism have been successfully carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An article titled "Smile of great man" was also posted on the website.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, December 22 (KCNA) -- Polish and Nigerian organizations issued statements on Dec. 4 and 15 on the occasion of the second anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Polish branch of the Korean Friendship Association said in its statement:
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the people's happiness, always finding himself among them till the last moments of his life.
					
					 One of his greatest feats is that he turned the DPRK into a country that manufactures and launches satellites and a nuclear weapons state.
					
					 It was thanks to his energetic and dedicated efforts that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were adopted between the north and the south and a new turn was made in the cause for the reunification of Korea.
					
					 His undying feats will always be remembered by the Koreans and the progressive people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il is alive as the sun.
					
					 The Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association said as follows in its statement:
					
					 His Excellency Kim Jong Il was an outstanding revolutionary and a peerless great man.
					
					 He, with his transparent faith in socialism and matchless pluck, pursued unique Songun politics. This foiled the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and demonstrated the dignity of the nation all over the world, thereby reliably defending the regional peace and security.
					
					 His noble idea and cause are being brilliantly carried forward by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The future of the DPRK is bright as it is led by Kim Jong Un.
